meanings.definition: A dish consisting of melted cheese on toast.
meanings.sent1: I ordered some delicious rarebits for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She made rarebits for the party, and they were a hit.
meanings.sent3: The rarebits at the restaurant were so cheesy and tasty.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling rarebits filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown rarebits were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A small piece of bread or toast with a savory topping.
meanings.sent1: The appetizers included bite-sized rarebits with different toppings.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the flavorful rarebits at the brunch.
meanings.sent3: The tiny rarebits were like little flavor explosions in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The rarebits were like tiny flavor bombs on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The savory rarebits were the highlight of the meal.
